META.TITLE: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu - Pediatrics and Child Health Specialist | Istanbul Ataşehir
META.DESCRIPTION: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu - Pediatrics and Child Health Specialist in Istanbul Ataşehir. Baby and child health, vaccination, development monitoring and treatment services. For appointments: 0216 688 44 83

HOME.HERO_TITLE: A holistic medical practice bringing together social pediatrics and child development disciplines with compassion and love
HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE: SPEC.DR. ÖZLEM MURZOĞLU PEDIATRICS AND CHILD HEALTH CLINIC
HOME.HERO_DESCRIPTION: With modern medicine and a caring approach

ABOUT.PAGE_SUBTITLE: Integrating child health with social pediatrics and child development
ABOUT.TITLE: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Pediatrics and Child Health Specialist
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: With over 15 years of experience, I apply the most current treatment methods for your children's health. We provide services according to American Academy of Pediatrics standards.
ABOUT.MISSION_DESC: To provide care in a loving environment with the most current medical knowledge for the healthy growth and development of your children.
ABOUT.VISION_DESC: To be a leading clinic in child health with globally accepted methods according to American Academy of Pediatrics standards.
ABOUT.VALUES_DESC: We operate with principles of scientific approach, transparency, empathy, and continuous improvement.

DR_PAGE.ROOTS_TEXT: I grew up in a small, unique and authentic Black Sea city, living through the famous local jokes. I shared my passion for trees and soil with my best preschool friends - my mother and grandfather. As the youngest of four children, I was deeply loved and I loved deeply, testing my dear sister's patience for years.
DR_PAGE.EDUCATION_TEXT: My university student sister enrolled me in primary school, while my university student brother enrolled me in prep school. As the capable child my dear father described, I managed all my subsequent enrollments myself. I met many of my lifelong friends at Rize Anatolian High School, the greatest value my education gave me. Again, I loved deeply and was deeply loved.
DR_PAGE.EDUCATION_TEXT2: In 2007, I graduated from Istanbul Medical Faculty, created by my distinguished professors who said 'If you don't have an idea about the diagnosis by the time the patient enters the room and sits down, quit this job.'
DR_PAGE.FAMILY_TEXT: I worked in the pharmaceutical industry for a while. During this time, following our generations-old family tradition, I had already fallen in love. Despite my feminist grandmother's attempts to instill anti-marriage sentiments throughout my childhood, in 2008 I married my dear love Mahir, whom I had known since I was twelve.
DR_PAGE.PEDIATRICS_TEXT: Far from all professional reasoning, simply because I love children very much, I started my Pediatrics specialization at Marmara University in 2011. In this institution where patients were treated in the number/variety of a Training and Research Hospital with a university approach, I got very tired and learned a lot.
DR_PAGE.PEDIATRICS_TEXT2: After completing my specialization, I returned to Marmara University Pendik Training and Research Hospital, which I had left due to a brief mandatory service adventure, and started working as a pediatrician. During the total of 11 years I worked in the emergency room, children's clinics, and all wards, I experienced great professional satisfaction with more cases and challenges than could be found anywhere else.
DR_PAGE.HEALTHY_CHILD_TEXT: As a physician with extensive practice with sick children until then, the upcoming birth of my daughter in 2014 pushed me with great curiosity into 'Healthy Child Medicine'. To academically strengthen my insatiable field readings, I started the Social Pediatrics Doctoral Program at Marmara University in 2019. I passed my doctoral qualification in 2021 and continue my academic life with my thesis process. In 2023, I graduated from Istanbul University's Child Development undergraduate program.
DR_PAGE.NEW_BEGINNING_TEXT: As an admired professor of mine said, 'To be a good doctor, enough patients and the right books are sufficient.' In July 2022, I left my work-school Marmara University Pendik Training and Research Hospital, where I had the opportunity to verify this experience.
DR_PAGE.NEW_BEGINNING_TEXT2: It was time to practice pediatrics with evidence-based, scientific data, with the facilities, time, and proximity to do so.
DR_PAGE.NEW_BEGINNING_TEXT3: I am starting a new journey with the support of my husband, daughter, mother, extended family, and my dear friends. From now on, I will welcome my children in my own clinic and enjoy being amazed by them every day despite my years of experience with children.

INSTITUTION.ISTANBUL_MEDICAL: Istanbul University Istanbul Faculty of Medicine

COMPANY.MARMARA_HOSPITAL: Marmara University Pendik Training and Research Hospital

SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.TITLE: Triple P® Program
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.DESC: Positive Parenting Program - Licensed by University of Queensland
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.HERO_SUBTITLE: Licensed Triple P® Practitioner from University of Queensland
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.INTRO: Strengthen your relationship with your child, reduce behavioral problems, and increase family harmony.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.WHAT_IS_DESC: Triple P – Positive Parenting Program® is a parenting and family support system designed to prevent and also treat behavioral and emotional problems in children and youth.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.DR_CERTIFIED: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu holds a Triple P Group Program Practitioner license approved by the University of Queensland.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.GROUP_DESC: The Group Triple P program is implemented at our clinic for parents of children aged 2-12 years.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.WHAT_IS_DESC2: Developed by the University of Queensland, the program is based on over 35 years of clinical research. It is currently applied in more than 25 countries and has reached over 4 million children and families worldwide.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.WHAT_IS_DESC3: Triple P gives parents the skills they need to build stronger, healthier relationships with their children and feel confident in supporting their children's development.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.FAMILIES_DESC: Number of families benefiting from the program
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.UNIVERSITY_DESC: Where it was developed and approved
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.STEP_1_DESC: Creating a safe and engaging environment
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PROGRAM_DURATION_DESC: One session per week for 8 weeks
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PROGRAM_DESC: Throughout the program, parents watch video examples, participate in group discussions, and learn practical strategies they can apply at home. Weekly homework assignments ensure that learned techniques are transferred to daily life.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.INDIVIDUAL_SUPPORT_DESC: In addition to group sessions, each parent receives 15-30 minutes of phone support once a week.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.STUDIES_DESC: Proven effectiveness through randomized controlled trials
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.IMPROVEMENT_DESC: Significant reduction in child behavior problems
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.EXPERIENCE_DESC: Continuously evolving and updated program content
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.WHO_APPROVED_DESC: Program recommended by the World Health Organization
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.REGISTRATION_DESC: Registration is open for our next group program
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.LEVEL_GROUP_DESC: Small group training sessions for parents
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.STEPPING_STONES_DESC: For parents of children with disabilities
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.TOTAL_PUBLICATIONS_DESC: Scientific research and studies including peer-reviewed articles, books, and chapters
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.EFFECTIVENESS_STUDIES_DESC: Comprehensive effectiveness research across diverse populations and settings
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.CLINICAL_DETAIL: Significant improvement in child behavior problems
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.INSPIRE_INFO: Part of INSPIRE strategy for ending violence against children
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.INTRO_LEAD_TEXT: Triple P has reached millions of families in over 30 countries worldwide, supported by 40 years of research and proven effectiveness as a parenting support system.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.UNIVERSITY_DESCRIPTION: The program developed at the University of Queensland by Prof. Matt Sanders and his team is based on scientific findings in social learning theory, cognitive behavioral therapy, and developmental psychology.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.CERTIFIED_PRACTITIONER_DESC: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu is an accredited practitioner of the Triple P program and provides this valuable program to families.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PHILOSOPHY_TEXT: One of Triple P's most innovative features is its multi-layered and flexible support system that responds to each family's unique needs. The program is built on the principle of "minimum sufficiency": providing families with as much support as they need to achieve their goals, but not providing more than necessary that would make them dependent on external help.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.SELF_EFFICACY_DESC: Encourages parents to trust their own problem-solving skills
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.SELF_MANAGEMENT_DESC: Enables them to set their own goals and develop strategies
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.SELF_REGULATION_DESC: Provides the ability to solve problems independently
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PRINCIPLES_SUBTITLE: Five universal positive parenting principles taught at all levels of Triple P and forming the foundation of the program
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PRINCIPLE_1_DESC: Creating an encouraging environment that goes beyond protecting children from physical dangers, supporting their natural curiosity and allowing them to explore and learn.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PRINCIPLE_2_DESC: Parents are their children's first and most important teachers. Spending quality time, using descriptive praise, and giving positive responses to the child's interactions.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PRINCIPLE_3_DESC: Viewing discipline as a teaching opportunity, not punishment. Ensuring children take responsibility for their own behavior and learn to control themselves.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PRINCIPLE_4_DESC: Accepting that every child is unique and develops at their own pace. Eliminating the pressure created by perfectionist expectations.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.PRINCIPLE_5_DESC: Parenting is a marathon. Taking care of your own physical, mental and emotional needs is a fundamental requirement of effective parenting.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.CHILD_ABUSE_REDUCTION: Reduced child abuse and neglect cases
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.POPULATION_IMPACT_DESC: Large-scale implementation studies show that Triple P can create positive changes at the community level.
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.SESSION_1_CONTENT: Core principles of positive parenting, importance of child development, and strategies for creating a safe learning environment
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.SESSION_2_CONTENT: Reinforcing desired behaviors, descriptive praise, and skill teaching through modeling
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.SESSION_3_CONTENT: Effective discipline strategies, consistent consequences, and techniques for staying calm
SERVICE_TRIPLE_P.SESSION_4_CONTENT: Proactive planning for high-risk situations, problem-solving skills, and continuing the parenting journey independently

SERVICE_SLEEP.TITLE: Healthy Sleep™
SERVICE_SLEEP.HERO_SUBTITLE: Peaceful nights with sleep training and consultation
SERVICE_SLEEP.INTRO: We provide support with scientific methods to help your baby and child develop healthy sleep habits.
SERVICE_SLEEP.WHAT_IS_DESC: Healthy Sleep™ is a comprehensive sleep training and consultation program aimed at helping babies and children develop age-appropriate, healthy sleep habits.
SERVICE_SLEEP.WHAT_IS_DESC2: The program was developed by Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu to solve families' sleep problems and ensure children get quality and sufficient sleep. Created with expertise in both social pediatrics and child development, this program is based on scientific foundations.
SERVICE_SLEEP.SUCCESS_RATE: We offer permanent solutions to families' sleep problems with a 95% success rate.
SERVICE_SLEEP.WHAT_IS_DESC3: The program offers personalized solutions based on the understanding that every child is unique. Sustainable sleep habits are created that suit the family's lifestyle and the child's developmental characteristics.
SERVICE_SLEEP.PROBLEM_2: Children who have difficulty falling asleep
SERVICE_SLEEP.PROBLEM_8: Desire to move to parent's bed
SERVICE_SLEEP.FEATURE_1_DESC: Custom sleep plan for each family
SERVICE_SLEEP.BENEFITS_BABY_3: Happier and more energetic during the day
SERVICE_SLEEP.STORY_1_DESC: Our baby who woke up 8-10 times a night now sleeps through until morning.
SERVICE_SLEEP.STORY_2_DESC: Our child who cried for 2 hours to sleep now falls asleep in 15 minutes.
SERVICE_SLEEP.STORY_3_DESC: Our child who came to parent's bed every night started sleeping in their own bed.
SERVICE_SLEEP.CTA_TITLE: Take the First Step to Peaceful Sleep
SERVICE_SLEEP.CTA_DESC: Contact us for detailed information about the Healthy Sleep™ program and to schedule an appointment.
SERVICE_SLEEP.SPECIAL_CASES_DESC: We have experience with special situations
SERVICE_SLEEP.SUCCESS_GUARANTEE_DESC: We support you until success is achieved
SERVICE_SLEEP.INTRO_TITLE: We're Here for Your Baby's Sleep Journey
SERVICE_SLEEP.INTRO_LEAD: By blending the scientific foundations of Possums and GeMSS approaches, we offer solutions tailored to your family's needs while supporting your baby's natural sleep rhythm.
SERVICE_SLEEP.PHILOSOPHY_TEXT: Every baby is unique and every family dynamic is different. Therefore, instead of a single sleep training method, we offer flexible and personalized approaches based on scientific research. Our goal is to ensure both your baby and you have peaceful sleep.
SERVICE_SLEEP.SCIENCE_SUBTITLE: Understanding the fundamental components of sleep for more effective solutions
SERVICE_SLEEP.ARCHITECTURE_DESC: Babies have different sleep cycles than adults
SERVICE_SLEEP.PRESSURE_DESC: Sleep need increases with time spent awake
SERVICE_SLEEP.POSSUMS_DESC: An Australian-origin, baby-centered approach that addresses the biological and emotional factors underlying sleep problems.
SERVICE_SLEEP.GEMSS_DESC: Gradual Extinction with Minimal Parental Stress - A gradual extinction method that minimizes parental stress.
SERVICE_SLEEP.COMBINED_DESC: By combining the strengths of both approaches, we create a customized plan that fits your family's values and lifestyle.
SERVICE_SLEEP.CHALLENGE_NAP_DESC: Short daytime naps and sleep resistance
SERVICE_SLEEP.CHALLENGE_FEEDING_DESC: Habit of falling asleep while nursing or bottle-feeding
SERVICE_SLEEP.INDEPENDENCE_DESC: Child learns to fall asleep independently with minimal parental support
SERVICE_SLEEP.DURING_ILLNESS_DESC: Provide more support temporarily, don't worry
SERVICE_SLEEP.RECOVERY_DESC: Gradually return to old routine (3-5 days)
SERVICE_SLEEP.NAP_SOLUTION_1: Identify appropriate sleep windows (watch for tiredness cues)
SERVICE_SLEEP.NAP_SOLUTION_2: Establish a consistent daytime sleep routine
SERVICE_SLEEP.NAP_SOLUTION_3: Optimize room environment (dark, quiet, appropriate temperature)
SERVICE_SLEEP.SEPARATION_SOLUTION_1: Practice daytime separations (start with short separations)
SERVICE_SLEEP.SEPARATION_SOLUTION_3: Use a transitional object (favorite toy or blanket)
SERVICE_SLEEP.TESTIMONIAL_1: Thanks to the 13-day program, our baby now sleeps through the night. Our life has changed! Dr. Murzoğlu's patient and scientific approach helped us so much.
SERVICE_SLEEP.TESTIMONIAL_2: We got consultation for our 18-month-old daughter. There was a great improvement in daytime naps and night wakings. We definitely recommend it!
SERVICE_SLEEP.TESTIMONIAL_3: Our 3-year-old son had bedtime resistance. After the program, he sleeps happily in his own bed. Thank you so much!
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_Q1: What age group is the program suitable for?
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_A1: The Healthy Sleep™ program offers personalized solutions for all children from 4 months to 6 years old. Methods are adapted according to the developmental characteristics of each age group.
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_Q2: How long does it take to see results?
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_A2: Most families see first improvements within 3-5 days. Full success may take an average of 2-4 weeks. Every child is different and progress rates may vary.
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_Q3: Will the program harm my child?
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_A3: No. The Healthy Sleep™ program is based on scientific research and respects your child's emotional needs. Gentle, gradual methods are used and strengthen the parent-child bond.
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_Q4: Can I apply the program while breastfeeding?
SERVICE_SLEEP.FAQ_A4: Yes! The program supports breastfeeding. We help you regulate the breastfeeding-sleep relationship in a healthy way. It is possible to gradually reduce night feedings.

CTA.TITLE: Ready for Peaceful Nights?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Get personalized sleep coaching for your little one. Book your free consultation today.

HPV_VACCINE.title: HPV Vaccine Information Sheet
HPV_VACCINE.description: Information about HPV vaccine, its benefits, who should get it, and possible side effects
HPV_VACCINE.content:
# HPV Vaccine Information

## Why Get Vaccinated?

HPV vaccine can prevent infection with disease-causing types of human papillomavirus (HPV).

## Benefits
- Prevents over 90% of HPV-caused cancers
- Protects against genital warts
- Safe and effective

## Who Should Get It?
- Routinely recommended for 11-12 year olds
- Can be given from age 9
- Recommended for everyone through age 26

## Schedule
- 2 doses if first dose before age 15
- 3 doses if first dose at age 15 or older

## Possible Side Effects
- Pain, redness, or swelling at injection site
- Fever
- Headache

These are usually mild and go away on their own.

KKK_VACCINE.title: MMR Vaccine Information Sheet
KKK_VACCINE.description: Information about MMR (Measles, Mumps, Rubella) vaccine
KKK_VACCINE.content:
# MMR Vaccine Information

## Why Get Vaccinated?

MMR vaccine can protect against measles, mumps, and rubella.

## Benefits
- Prevents serious complications from these diseases
- Provides long-lasting immunity
- Protects the community

## Schedule
- First dose: 12-15 months
- Second dose: 4-6 years

## Side Effects
- Mild fever
- Mild rash
- Swelling of glands

KKKS_VACCINE.title: MMRV Vaccine Information Sheet
KKKS_VACCINE.description: Information about MMRV (Measles, Mumps, Rubella, Varicella) vaccine
KKKS_VACCINE.content:
# MMRV Vaccine Information

MMRV vaccine protects against measles, mumps, rubella, and varicella (chickenpox).

MENINGOKOK_ACWY_VACCINE.title: Meningococcal ACWY Vaccine Information
MENINGOKOK_ACWY_VACCINE.content:
# Meningococcal ACWY Vaccine

Protects against meningococcal disease caused by serogroups A, C, W, and Y.

MENINGOKOK_B_VACCINE.title: Meningococcal B Vaccine Information
MENINGOKOK_B_VACCINE.content:
# Meningococcal B Vaccine

Protects against meningococcal disease caused by serogroup B.

INFLUENZA_VACCINE.title: Influenza Vaccine Information
INFLUENZA_VACCINE.content:
# Influenza Vaccine

Annual vaccination recommended for protection against seasonal flu.

ROTAVIRUS_VACCINE.title: Rotavirus Vaccine Information
ROTAVIRUS_VACCINE.content:
# Rotavirus Vaccine

Protects infants and young children against rotavirus gastroenteritis.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Get detailed information about topics you're curious about
FAQ.NO_RESULTS_DESC: There are no questions in this category yet.
FAQ.CONTACT_DESC: If you couldn't find the answer you're looking for, contact us.
FAQ.CTA_DESCRIPTION: We're here to help you. Get in touch with us and let us answer your questions.
FAQ.Q1: What age group of children do you treat at your clinic?
FAQ.A1: We provide services for all children aged 0-18 years at our clinic. We have specialized approaches for every age group from newborn period to the end of adolescence.
FAQ.Q2: What do I need to do to make an appointment?
FAQ.A2: You can book an appointment online through our website, call us at 0222 237 84 00, or send a message via our WhatsApp line. Our online appointment system is available 24/7.
FAQ.Q3: Is my private health insurance valid?
FAQ.A3: We do not have direct provision agreements with private health insurance companies. Our patients can benefit from reimbursement according to their policy terms using the private health insurance information form and freelance invoice we provide after the examination.
FAQ.Q4: What is the Bright Futures program?
FAQ.A4: Bright Futures is a comprehensive health monitoring program developed by the American Academy of Pediatrics that tracks your child's physical, mental, and social development from birth to adolescence. It includes age-specific assessment forms and detailed examinations lasting at least 1 hour.
FAQ.Q5: Can I come to your clinic in emergencies?
FAQ.A5: Our clinic operates by appointment system. For emergencies, we recommend visiting the nearest hospital emergency department. However, we provide emergency consultation services for our scheduled patients.
FAQ.Q6: Can we get vaccinations according to the vaccination schedule?
FAQ.A6: Yes, all routine vaccines according to the Ministry of Health's current vaccination schedule and special vaccines are administered at our clinic. Vaccination tracking is done digitally and reminder service is provided.
FAQ.Q7: Do you provide online consultation services?
FAQ.A7: Yes, we provide online consultation services especially for our follow-up patients. We offer remote examination and consultation services via video conference.
FAQ.Q8: Are laboratory tests performed at the clinic?
FAQ.A8: Basic laboratory tests such as blood count, urinalysis, and rapid tests can be performed at our clinic. For more comprehensive tests, we refer to our partner laboratories.
FAQ.Q9: I want to cancel or change my appointment, what should I do?
FAQ.A9: You can cancel or change your appointment at least 24 hours in advance. You can make appointment changes through the online system, by phone, or by contacting us via WhatsApp.
FAQ.Q10: What should I bring for the first examination?
FAQ.A10: For the first examination, please bring your child's identification information, previous medical reports if any, vaccination card, list of medications used, and insurance documents if you have insurance.
FAQ.Q11: How long does the examination take?
FAQ.A11: Our standard examinations take an average of 30-45 minutes, while our Bright Futures comprehensive examinations take a minimum of 1 hour. First examinations usually take longer.

APPROACH.FAMILY_EDUCATION_DESC: We teach parents positive parenting techniques through the Triple P program
APPROACH.SLEEP_NUTRITION_DESC: Healthy sleep habits and nutrition counseling services
APPROACH.LOVE_COMPASSION_DESC: We approach every child and family with love, compassion and empathy
APPROACH.SOCIAL_PEDIATRICS_DESC: We support not only physical but also social and emotional development
APPROACH.FAMILY_CENTERED_DESC: We make families an active part of the treatment process
APPROACH.EVIDENCE_BASED_DESC: We apply treatment protocols based on the latest scientific research

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Reviews from Our Families
TESTIMONIALS.SUBTITLE: We are happy to have served dozens of families with our 15 years of experience
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_1: Dr. Özlem is truly a special doctor who knows how to approach children. I feel much safer thanks to the care and patience she shows at every check-up of my son, and the detailed information she provides. I researched a lot when choosing a pediatrician, I definitely made the right choice.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_2: The cleanliness and modern equipment of the clinic caught my attention. Thanks to Dr. Özlem's social pediatrics approach, my daughter's fear of doctors has completely disappeared. It's also very easy to make an appointment, and the assistants are very attentive and helpful.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_3: My child had recurring infections. Now he is much healthier thanks to Dr. Özlem's accurate diagnosis and patient treatment. Both her knowledge and approach to children are perfect. We are very satisfied as a family.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_4: We go for my son's growth and development follow-up. Dr. Özlem performs a very detailed examination every time and patiently answers every question we have. The clinic's atmosphere is also very comfortable and peaceful for children.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_5: When we applied for my twin babies, Dr. Özlem supported us a lot. She solved our feeding problems and helped us establish sleep routines. She is truly an experienced and child-loving doctor. I recommend her to everyone.
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_6: We regularly go for my child's vaccination tracking. Dr. Özlem provides very detailed information about vaccines and never rushes. Our waiting time at the clinic is never long. The appointment system works very orderly.

HERO.TITLE: Our Clinic
HERO.SUBTITLE: At your service with child-friendly design and modern infrastructure

MISSION.TITLE: A Special Environment for Our Little Guests
MISSION.TEXT: We set out to create a warm environment that will turn the doctor's visit into a positive experience for our little guests.
MISSION.GOAL: Our main goal in designing the clinic was to create an atmosphere that would not leave negative memories in children and would not cause fear of going to the doctor.

TEAM.TITLE: Our Design Team
TEAM.SUBTITLE: The valuable professionals who contributed to the architecture of our clinic
TEAM.CH_NAMES: Senior Architect Ebru Hacıoğlu and Architect Coşkun Hacıoğlu
TEAM.CH_DESC: The experienced team that prepared the architectural project of our clinic
TEAM.INTERIOR_NAME: Interior Architect Özkan Coşkun and team
TEAM.PHILOSOPHY_DESC: We created a simple and warm environment with white lacquer and walnut veneer furniture. We emphasized elements that would add a child-friendly atmosphere to the interior design.

MONTESSORI.TITLE: Designed with the Montessori Approach
MONTESSORI.TEXT: Following the Montessori school, we aimed to give children freedom of movement and activity in our clinic. We enabled children to move freely and play in all areas of the space.
MONTESSORI.COLORS: In material selection, we preferred yellow and tile colors, which are part of our clinic's corporate identity.
MONTESSORI.FEATURE1: Books that can appeal to children of all ages

CLINIC.BABY_ROOM: We also created a baby care and breastfeeding room. We tried to create a comfortable and peaceful atmosphere in this room.

HYGIENE.TITLE: Our Uncompromising Hygiene Standards
HYGIENE.SUBTITLE: We prioritize your health with our meticulous cleaning practices
HYGIENE.TEXT: While your children move freely and play in our clinic, we perform the necessary disinfection procedures on all surfaces with quality products so that you don't have to worry about their health.
HYGIENE.UVC_TEXT: We routinely disinfect our materials especially for young children with UV-C.
HYGIENE.SURFACE_TEXT: We perform disinfection procedures on all surfaces with quality products.
HYGIENE.PARENTS_TEXT: You can also benefit from the UV-C disinfection device and surface disinfectants in our clinic as you wish.

CLINIC.GALLERY_SUBTITLE: Spaces designed for our little patients to feel safe and happy in our modern, hygienic, and child-friendly environment

CTA.TITLE: We Are Here for Your Child's Health
CTA.SUBTITLE: We would be happy to welcome you to our modern clinic

CLINIC.FEATURE_CHILD_FRIENDLY_DESC: Colorful and fun areas where children will feel comfortable
CLINIC.FEATURE_HYGIENE_DESC: Sterile and safe examination environment with the highest hygiene standards
CLINIC.FEATURE_ACCESS_DESC: Arrangement suitable for stroller and wheelchair access

DOCTOR_BIO.TITLE: Spec. Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu
DOCTOR_BIO.SUBTITLE: Pediatrics and Child Health Specialist
DOCTOR_BIO.BIO_PARAGRAPH_1: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu graduated from Istanbul University Istanbul Faculty of Medicine and completed her pediatrics specialization training at Marmara University Faculty of Medicine Department of Pediatrics and Child Health.
DOCTOR_BIO.BIO_PARAGRAPH_2: Having received her doctorate degree in Social Pediatrics from the same institution, Dr. Murzoğlu also completed her bachelor's degree in Child Development simultaneously, developing a holistic approach to child health.
DOCTOR_BIO.BIO_PARAGRAPH_3: Specializing in Bright Futures® Well-Child Care, sleep consultation, and Triple P® Positive Parenting Program, Dr. Murzoğlu provides comprehensive pediatric services to families at her clinic in Ataşehir.
DOCTOR_BIO.MEDICAL_SCHOOL: Istanbul University Istanbul Faculty of Medicine
DOCTOR_BIO.SPECIALIZATION_SCHOOL: Marmara University Pediatrics and Child Health

CONTACT_CTA.DESCRIPTION: We are by your side for your child's healthy development with our modern clinic, evidence-based medicine, and compassionate approach.

LEGAL.PRIVACY_INTRO_TEXT: As Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatrics and Child Health Clinic, we value the privacy of our patients and website visitors. This Privacy Policy explains how your personal data is collected, used, stored, and protected.
LEGAL.PERSONAL_INFO_1: Name, surname, date of birth, and identification information
LEGAL.PERSONAL_INFO_2: Phone number, email address, and contact information
LEGAL.HEALTH_INFO_1: Medical history and current health status
LEGAL.DATA_USE_1: Providing medical diagnosis and treatment services
LEGAL.DATA_USE_4: Improving health services and quality control
LEGAL.DATA_PROTECTION_TEXT: The following measures are taken to ensure the security of your personal data:
LEGAL.PROTECTION_MEASURE_1: Secure data transmission with SSL encryption
LEGAL.PROTECTION_MEASURE_2: Encrypted data storage and backup systems
LEGAL.DATA_SHARING_TEXT: Your personal data is not shared with third parties except in the following cases:
LEGAL.SHARING_CASE_1: Legal obligations and official authority requests
LEGAL.SHARING_CASE_2: When medical consultation is required, with your consent
LEGAL.SHARING_CASE_3: For payment processing with health insurance
LEGAL.SHARING_CASE_4: With laboratories and imaging centers when necessary
LEGAL.YOUR_RIGHTS_TEXT: Under KVKK, you have the following rights:
LEGAL.RIGHT_1: Learning whether your personal data is processed
LEGAL.RIGHT_2: Requesting information about your personal data
LEGAL.RIGHT_3: Requesting correction of your personal data
LEGAL.RIGHT_4: Requesting deletion or destruction of your personal data
LEGAL.RIGHT_5: Objecting to the processing of your personal data
LEGAL.RIGHT_6: Requesting compensation in case of damage
LEGAL.COOKIES_TEXT: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. Cookies are small text files stored by your browser. You can disable cookies from your browser settings.
LEGAL.CHILDREN_PRIVACY_TEXT: Personal data of our patients under 18 years of age is processed with the consent of their legal representatives. The privacy and security of our child patients are protected at the highest level.
LEGAL.CHANGES_TEXT: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Changes become effective on the date they are published on our website. Please check this page regularly.
LEGAL.CONTACT_TEXT: You can contact us for questions about our privacy policy or requests regarding your personal data:
LEGAL.TERMS_INTRO_TEXT: These terms of use govern the use of Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatrics and Child Health Clinic website (ozlemmurzoglu.com) and our health services. By visiting our website or using our services, you declare that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms.
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_1: The website is for informational purposes and does not replace medical advice
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_2: In emergencies, call 112 or go to the nearest health facility
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_3: Booking an appointment does not mean automatic acceptance, confirmation is required
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_4: Our services are only provided at our clinic address
LEGAL.SERVICE_TERM_5: Online consultation services are subject to predetermined conditions
LEGAL.BOOKING_RULE_1: Appointments must be made at least 24 hours in advance
LEGAL.BOOKING_RULE_2: Only one appointment can be made per day
LEGAL.BOOKING_RULE_3: Appointment confirmation is done via SMS or phone
LEGAL.CANCELLATION_POLICY_1: Appointment cancellations must be made at least 4 hours in advance
LEGAL.CANCELLATION_POLICY_2: New appointment restrictions may apply for patients who miss 2 consecutive appointments
LEGAL.CANCELLATION_POLICY_3: No cancellation period is required for emergencies
LEGAL.PAYMENT_TERM_1: Examination and treatment fees are collected after the service
LEGAL.PAYMENT_TERM_2: Cash, credit card, and debit card payments are accepted
LEGAL.PAYMENT_TERM_3: Please inform us of your invoice request before the examination
LEGAL.PAYMENT_TERM_4: You can call our clinic for detailed information about contracted private health insurance and institutions
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITIES_TEXT: By using our website and services, you accept the following responsibilities:
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_1: Providing accurate, current, and complete information in appointment and contact forms
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_2: Respecting the rights and privacy of other patients and clinic staff
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_3: Complying with the laws of the Republic of Turkey and medical ethics rules
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_4: Avoiding actions that endanger website security, contain malware, or disrupt system operation
LEGAL.USER_RESPONSIBILITY_5: Not copying, distributing, or using clinic content and materials for commercial purposes without permission
LEGAL.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_TEXT: All content, texts, images, design elements, logos, graphics, and other materials on our website belong to Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatrics and Child Health Clinic and are protected by the Copyright Law of the Republic of Turkey. Unauthorized copying, reproduction, distribution, or commercial use of these materials is strictly prohibited.
LEGAL.MEDICAL_DISCLAIMER_TEXT: IMPORTANT: All health information, articles, and recommendations on this website are for general information and educational purposes only. This information does not replace professional medical examination, diagnosis, or treatment. For any concerns, symptoms, or illness regarding your child's health, please make an appointment for an in-person examination. Diagnosis and treatment recommendations cannot be made over the internet.
LEGAL.LIABILITY_TEXT: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatrics and Child Health Clinic cannot be held responsible for any direct or indirect, material or moral damages that may arise from the use or inability to use the website, or from decisions made based on the information on the site. Our medical services are provided in accordance with the regulations of the Ministry of Health of the Republic of Turkey, under professional liability insurance coverage.
LEGAL.GOVERNING_LAW_TEXT: These terms of use are subject to the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Istanbul (Bakırköy) Courts and Enforcement Offices have jurisdiction in resolving any disputes that may arise from these terms.
LEGAL.TERMS_CHANGES_TEXT: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatrics and Child Health Clinic reserves the right to change these terms of use without prior notice. Changes become effective from the date they are published on the website. Your continued use of our website means you accept the current terms.
LEGAL.KVKK_INTRO_TEXT: This disclosure text has been prepared to inform you about the processing of your personal data as a data controller by Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu Pediatrics Clinic, in accordance with Article 10 of Law No. 6698 on Protection of Personal Data.
LEGAL.KVKK_IDENTITY_DATA_TEXT: Name, surname, Turkish ID number, date of birth, place of birth, marital status, gender
LEGAL.KVKK_HEALTH_DATA_TEXT: Medical history, examination findings, test results, treatment information, prescriptions, vaccination records
LEGAL.KVKK_TRANSACTION_DATA_TEXT: IP address, visited pages, browser information
LEGAL.KVKK_LEGAL_BASIS_TEXT: Your personal data is processed based on the following legal grounds specified in Articles 5 and 6 of KVKK:
LEGAL.KVKK_LEGAL_BASIS_2: Being explicitly provided for in laws
LEGAL.KVKK_LEGAL_BASIS_3: Inability to obtain consent due to actual impossibility
LEGAL.KVKK_LEGAL_BASIS_4: Being necessary for the establishment or performance of a contract
LEGAL.KVKK_TRANSFER_TEXT: Your collected personal data may be transferred to the following parties limited to the purposes stated above:
LEGAL.KVKK_TRANSFER_1: Ministry of Health and affiliated institutions
LEGAL.KVKK_RETENTION_TEXT: Your personal data is retained for the periods specified in relevant legislation (minimum 20 years for medical records) or until the processing purpose ceases. Upon expiration of the period or cessation of the processing purpose, your data will be deleted, destroyed, or anonymized.
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the following rights under Article 11 of KVKK:
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_1: Learning whether your personal data is processed
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_2: If processed, requesting information about it
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_3: Learning the processing purpose and whether it is used appropriately
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_4: Knowing the third parties to whom it is transferred domestically or abroad
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_5: Requesting correction if incomplete or incorrectly processed
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_6: Requesting deletion or destruction within the framework of conditions in Article 7 of KVKK
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_7: Requesting notification of correction or deletion operations to third parties
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_8: Objecting to adverse results arising from analysis exclusively through automated systems
LEGAL.KVKK_RIGHT_9: Requesting compensation for damages due to unlawful processing
LEGAL.KVKK_APPLICATION_TEXT: In accordance with Article 13 of KVKK, you can submit your request to use your above rights in writing or via registered electronic mail (KEP) address, signed with secure electronic signature, or using the email address you previously notified to our clinic at info@drozlemmurzoglu.com.
LEGAL.KVKK_APPLICATION_INFO: Your application will be evaluated and concluded within 30 days at the latest. The application is free of charge, but a fee may be charged if the transaction requires additional costs.
LEGAL.KVKK_CONTACT_TEXT: You can contact us for detailed information about your rights under KVKK and application processes:

HPV_VACCINE.title: HPV Vaccine Information Sheet
HPV_VACCINE.description: Detailed information about HPV (human papillomavirus) vaccine
HPV_VACCINE.content:
HPV Vaccine

Why Get Vaccinated?

HPV (human papillomavirus) vaccine can prevent infection with some types of human papillomavirus.

HPV infections can cause certain types of cancers including:

  • Cervical, vaginal, and vulvar cancers in women
  • Penile cancer in men
  • Anal cancer in men and women
  • Cancers of the tonsils, base of tongue, and back of throat (oropharyngeal cancer) in men and women

HPV infections can also cause anogenital warts.

HPV vaccine can prevent over 90% of cancers caused by HPV.

HPV is spread through intimate skin-to-skin contact or sexual activity. HPV infections are so common that nearly all people get at least one type of HPV at some point in their lives.

Most HPV infections go away by themselves within 2 years. But sometimes HPV infections last longer and can cause cancers later in life.

HPV Vaccines

HPV vaccine is routinely recommended for adolescents at 11 or 12 years of age to ensure they are protected before they are exposed to the virus. HPV vaccine may be given beginning at age 9 years, and is recommended for everyone through 26 years of age.

HPV vaccine may be given to adults 27 through 45 years of age, based on discussion between the patient and healthcare provider.

Most children who get the first dose before 15 years of age need 2 doses of HPV vaccine. People who get the first dose at 15 years of age or older, and younger people with certain immunocompromising conditions need 3 doses. Your healthcare provider can give you more information.

HPV vaccine may be given at the same time as other vaccines.

Talk with Your Healthcare Provider

Tell your vaccine provider if the person getting the vaccine:

  • Has had an allergic reaction after a previous dose of HPV vaccine, or has any severe, life-threatening allergies
  • Is pregnant. HPV vaccine is not recommended until after pregnancy

In some cases, your healthcare provider may decide to postpone HPV vaccination to a future visit.

People with minor illnesses, such as a cold, may be vaccinated. People who are moderately or severely ill should usually wait until they recover before getting HPV vaccine.

Your healthcare provider can give you more information.

Risks of a Vaccine Reaction

  • Pain, redness, or swelling at the injection site can happen after HPV vaccination.
  • Fever or headache can happen after HPV vaccination.

People sometimes faint after medical procedures, including vaccination. Tell your provider if you feel dizzy or have vision changes or ringing in the ears.

As with any medicine, there is a very remote chance of a vaccine causing a severe allergic reaction, other serious injury, or death.

What If There Is a Serious Problem?

An allergic reaction could occur after the vaccinated person leaves the clinic. If you see signs of a severe allergic reaction (hives, swelling of the face and throat, difficulty breathing, a fast heartbeat, dizziness, or weakness), call 911 and get the person to the nearest hospital.

For other signs that concern you, call your healthcare provider.

More Information

Some resources where you can find more detailed information about vaccines:

  • Turkish Ministry of Health Vaccine Portal: https://asi.saglik.gov.tr/
  • World Health Organization Vaccines Page: https://www.who.int/health-topics/vaccines-and-immunization
  • US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) Vaccines Page: https://www.fda.gov/vaccines-blood-biologics/vaccines
  • US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) Vaccines Page: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/index.html

Vaccine Information Statement ● HPV (8/6/21) ● English Translation ● www.immunize.org/vis
Distributed by the Immunization Action Coalition

SERVICE_BRIGHT.HERO_SUBTITLE: Child care based on American Academy of Pediatrics standards
SERVICE_BRIGHT.WHAT_IS_DESC: Bright Futures® is a comprehensive guideline program developed by the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) to monitor the health and development of children and youth from birth to age 21.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.WHAT_IS_DESC2: This program provides evidence-based recommendations to child health professionals and families to support children's optimal growth and development. It includes age-specific examination protocols, vaccination schedules, developmental assessments, and preventive health services.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.DR_CERTIFIED: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu is one of the rare specialists who implements the American Academy of Pediatrics' Bright Futures® standards in her clinic.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.WHAT_IS_DESC3: The program focuses on prevention rather than treatment of diseases. By addressing children's physical, mental, social, and emotional development as a whole, it enables early detection and intervention of potential problems.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.THREE_PILLARS: Three Core Pillars of the Program
SERVICE_BRIGHT.PILLAR_1_DESC: Systematic monitoring of child's growth and development
SERVICE_BRIGHT.VISIT_SCHEDULE_DESC: The Bright Futures® program recommends 31 age-specific regular health check-ups.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.EXAM_NOTE_DESC: Each examination includes age-appropriate physical examination, growth and development assessment, immunizations, and screening tests. Families receive specialized guidance materials.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.GROWTH_TRACKING_DESC: Height, weight, head circumference measurements and percentile assessment
SERVICE_BRIGHT.DEVELOPMENT_ASSESSMENT_DESC: Motor, language, social and cognitive development check
SERVICE_BRIGHT.VACCINATION_DESC: National and special vaccine schedule implementation
SERVICE_BRIGHT.NUTRITION_DESC: Age-appropriate nutrition guidance, breastfeeding support, introduction to solid foods
SERVICE_BRIGHT.SLEEP_DESC: Healthy sleep habits, sleep safety, approach to sleep problems
SERVICE_BRIGHT.SAFETY_DESC: Home and vehicle safety, accident prevention, poisoning protection
SERVICE_BRIGHT.PHYSICAL_ACTIVITY_DESC: Age-appropriate exercise recommendations, screen time limitation
SERVICE_BRIGHT.SCHOOL_READINESS_DESC: Cognitive development, school adaptation, learning skills
SERVICE_BRIGHT.COMPREHENSIVE_TRACKING_DESC: Physical, mental and social development tracking
SERVICE_BRIGHT.PREVENTIVE_APPROACH_DESC: Focused on disease and problem prevention
SERVICE_BRIGHT.CONTINUITY_DESC: Uninterrupted care from birth to adulthood
SERVICE_BRIGHT.FAMILY_RESOURCES_DESC: Families receive age-specific guidance materials after each examination.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.FAMILY_RESOURCES_DESC2: One of the most important features of the Bright Futures® program is that it doesn't leave families alone in the child-rearing process. Special booklets, brochures, and digital resources prepared for each age group are provided to families.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.AGE_GUIDES_DESC: Specially prepared developmental guides for each age
SERVICE_BRIGHT.TURKISH_MATERIALS: All Bright Futures® materials are provided translated into Turkish with cultural adaptation.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.JOURNEY_SUBTITLE: Healthy Growth Guide from Birth to Adolescence
SERVICE_BRIGHT.BABY_PHASE_DESC: Important check-ups and developmental milestones in the first year
SERVICE_BRIGHT.NEWBORN_DESC: First days, newborn care and first month assessment
SERVICE_BRIGHT.FIRST_VACCINES_DESC: Start of vaccination schedule, sleep patterns and feeding
SERVICE_BRIGHT.SOLID_FOODS_DESC: Starting solid foods, sitting and movement development
SERVICE_BRIGHT.FIRST_YEAR_PREP_DESC: Preparation for walking, first words and social development
SERVICE_BRIGHT.PRIMARY_SCHOOL_DESC: Reading, writing, math and social adaptation
SERVICE_BRIGHT.ADOLESCENT_PHASE_DESC: Major changes and preparation for adulthood
SERVICE_BRIGHT.RESOURCES_INFO: You can access family and child information sheets prepared for each age period from our Information Center section.
SERVICE_BRIGHT.CTA_DESC: Schedule an appointment for American standard child care

SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.LAB_DESC: We provide laboratory services directly at our clinic with the support of our corporate partner Biruni Laboratories.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.LAB_DESC2: We collect samples for necessary tests at our clinic without redirecting you to another facility.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.INSURANCE_PROCESS: We also complete private health insurance provision processes at our clinic with the support of Biruni Laboratories personnel.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.LAB_DESC3: In this context, we provide services for all biochemistry tests, blood and urine analyses, microbiology examinations, antibody and antigen detections (especially COVID-19, influenza, beta hemolytic streptococcus and other respiratory tract infection agents) without redirecting you to another address and without wasting time.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.RESULT_EMAIL: We ensure test results are sent to you via email.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.IMAGING_DESC: We provide all imaging services through our corporate partner Sonomed Medical Imaging Centers.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.IMAGING_DESC2: We refer you to Sonomed imaging centers for necessary imaging procedures.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.SONOMED_LOCATION: Magnetic resonance (MR) imaging, computed tomography (CT), ultrasonography and digital x-ray services are provided at the Sonomed Ataşehir branch, which is very close to our clinic.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.INSURANCE_INFO: If you have private health insurance, you can arrange for the necessary provisions.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.REPORTING_DESC: We inform you about the images and radiology reports shared online with our clinic by Sonomed and provide necessary guidance.
SERVICE_LAB_IMAGING.CTA_DESC: Reliable diagnostic services for your child's health

DR_PAGE.ROOTS_TEXT: I grew up experiencing Temel Jokes in a small and unique authentic Black Sea city. I shared my passion for trees and soil with my best friends before school, my mother and grandfather. As the youngest of four children in a family, I was greatly loved and I loved greatly, often testing my loving sister's patience over the years.
DR_PAGE.EDUCATION_TEXT: My sister, who was a university student, enrolled me in primary school, and my brother, also a university student, enrolled me in preparatory courses. As the capable child my dear father described, I was able to handle all my subsequent registrations myself. I met many of my friends, the greatest values my education gave me, at Rize Anatolian High School. Again, I loved greatly and was greatly loved.
DR_PAGE.EDUCATION_TEXT2: In 2007, I graduated from Istanbul Medical Faculty, created by my distinguished professors who said 'If you don't have an idea about the diagnosis by the time the patient enters the room and sits down, quit this job.'
DR_PAGE.FAMILY_TEXT: I worked in the pharmaceutical industry for a while. During this time, following our family tradition that has lasted for generations, I had already fallen in love. Despite my feminist grandmother's attempts to instill anti-marriage sentiment throughout my childhood, I married my dear love Mahir, whom I had known since the age of twelve, in 2008.
DR_PAGE.PEDIATRICS_TEXT: Far from all professional reasoning, simply because I love children very much, I started my Pediatrics specialization at Marmara University in 2011. In this institution where patients were treated in the number/variety of a Training and Research Hospital with a university approach, I got very tired and learned a lot.
DR_PAGE.PEDIATRICS_TEXT2: After completing my specialization, I returned to Marmara University Pendik Training and Research Hospital, which I had left due to a brief mandatory service adventure, and started working as a pediatrician. During the total of 11 years I worked in the emergency room, children's clinics, and all wards, I experienced great professional satisfaction with more cases and challenges than could be found anywhere else.
DR_PAGE.HEALTHY_CHILD_TEXT: Until then, I was a physician with extensive practice with sick children; the fact that my daughter would be born in 2014 pushed me with great curiosity towards 'Healthy Child Medicine'. With the intention of academically strengthening my insatiable field readings, I started the Social Pediatrics Doctoral Program at Marmara University in 2019. I passed my doctoral proficiency in 2021 and continue my academic life with my thesis process. In 2023, I graduated from Istanbul University's Child Development undergraduate program.
DR_PAGE.NEW_BEGINNING_TEXT: As a professor I admire said, 'Enough patients and the right books are enough to be a good doctor' - I left Marmara University Pendik Training and Research Hospital, my work-school where I had the opportunity to confirm this experience, in July 2022.
DR_PAGE.NEW_BEGINNING_TEXT2: It was time to practice pediatrics with evidence-based, scientific data, with the facilities, time, and proximity to do so.
DR_PAGE.NEW_BEGINNING_TEXT3: I am starting a new journey with the support of my husband, daughter, mother, extended family, and my dear friends. From now on, I will welcome my children in my own clinic and enjoy being amazed by them every day despite my years of experience with children.
DR_PAGE.SERVICE_2_DESC: National and special vaccine schedule implementation

AILE_MEDYA_PLANI.TITLE: Family Media Plan
AILE_MEDYA_PLANI.DESCRIPTION: Family guides and plans for digital media use

Tell your vaccine provider if the person getting the vaccine:

  • Has had an allergic reaction after a previous dose of HPV vaccine, or has any severe, life-threatening allergies
  • Is pregnant. HPV vaccine is not recommended until after pregnancy

In some cases, your healthcare provider may decide to postpone HPV vaccination to a future visit.

People with minor illnesses, such as a cold, may be vaccinated. People who are moderately or severely ill should usually wait until they recover before getting HPV vaccine.

Your healthcare provider can give you more information.

Risks of a Vaccine Reaction

  • Pain, redness, or swelling at the injection site can happen after HPV vaccination.
  • Fever or headache can happen after HPV vaccination.

People sometimes faint after medical procedures, including vaccination. Tell your provider if you feel dizzy or have vision changes or ringing in the ears.

As with any medicine, there is a very remote chance of a vaccine causing a severe allergic reaction, other serious injury, or death.

What If There Is a Serious Problem?

An allergic reaction could occur after the vaccinated person leaves the clinic. If you see signs of a severe allergic reaction (hives, swelling of the face and throat, difficulty breathing, a fast heartbeat, dizziness, or weakness), call 911 and get the person to the nearest hospital.

For other signs that concern you, call your healthcare provider.

CLINIC_DESIGN.TITLE: Our Clinic
CLINIC_DESIGN.SUBTITLE: Modern, hygienic and child-friendly environment
CLINIC_DESIGN.INTRO_TEXT: We set out to create a warm environment that turns doctor visits into a positive experience for our little guests.
CLINIC_DESIGN.INTRO_DESC: When designing the clinic, our main goal was to create an atmosphere that doesn't leave negative memories in children and won't cause fear of going to the doctor.
CLINIC_DESIGN.TEAM_DESC1: Our clinic was designed with child psychology and modern architectural principles in mind. Every corner was carefully planned to make children feel safe and happy.
CLINIC_DESIGN.TEAM_DESC2: We created a calming atmosphere using pastel tones and natural textures. We added wall paintings and decorative elements that support children's imagination.
CLINIC_DESIGN.DESIGN_FEATURE_1_DESC: Large windows and natural light sources
CLINIC_DESIGN.MONTESSORI_DESC: In our clinic, we support children's desire to explore and learn, inspired by the Montessori educational philosophy.
CLINIC_DESIGN.MONTESSORI_TEXT: By supporting children's natural curiosity and exploration instincts, we transform clinic visits into fun and educational experiences.
CLINIC_DESIGN.SAFETY_PHYSICAL_DESC: Corner protectors, non-slip floors and safe furniture
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_DESC: We apply the highest hygiene standards in our clinic.
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_TEXT: We provide a safe environment with regular disinfection, air purification systems and sterilization protocols.
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_NOTE: Special hygiene protocols are implemented as part of COVID-19 measures.
CLINIC_DESIGN.CTA_TITLE: Schedule an Appointment for Your Child
CLINIC_DESIGN.CTA_SUBTITLE: We are waiting for you in our modern and safe clinic

DR_OZLEM.NAME: Dr. Özlem Murzoğlu
DR_OZLEM.SUBTITLE: Pediatrics and Child Health Specialist
DR_OZLEM.QUOTE: Every child deserves the best possible start in life

CLINIC_DESIGN.TITLE: Our Clinic
CLINIC_DESIGN.SUBTITLE: A Safe and Welcoming Space for Children
CLINIC_DESIGN.INTRO_TITLE: A Clinic with the Warmth of Home
CLINIC_DESIGN.INTRO_TEXT: When designing our clinic, our priority was to create an environment where children can be examined safely without experiencing hospital fear.
CLINIC_DESIGN.INTRO_DESC: Every detail was planned with the comfort of our little patients and the peace of mind of families in mind. With warm colors, natural light and play areas, our clinic has become not just a healthcare center but a place that children love to visit.
CLINIC_DESIGN.TEAM_DESC1: The interior design of our clinic was carried out by Interior Architect Hande Avcıoğlu, an expert in children's spaces. The design, prepared with Montessori principles and child psychology in mind, meets the needs of all age groups.
CLINIC_DESIGN.TEAM_DESC2: Clinic furniture and custom-designed play areas were carefully selected with Mehmet Can Zeytinoğlu. Antibacterial and easy-to-clean materials that comply with safety standards were used.
CLINIC_DESIGN.DESIGN_FEATURE_1_DESC: Calming pastel tones and natural wood textures
CLINIC_DESIGN.DESIGN_FEATURE_2_DESC: Warm and friendly environment away from hospital atmosphere
CLINIC_DESIGN.DESIGN_FEATURE_3_DESC: Details that catch children's attention in every corner
CLINIC_DESIGN.MONTESSORI_DESC: Our waiting areas feature Montessori materials that support children's development. This transforms the pre-examination wait into a fun and educational experience.
CLINIC_DESIGN.MONTESSORI_TEXT: Following Maria Montessori's philosophy that "The child is the architect of their own learning process", we've transformed every corner of our clinic into a discovery area.
CLINIC_DESIGN.MONTESSORI_BOOKS_DESC: Carefully selected children's books suitable for every age group
CLINIC_DESIGN.MONTESSORI_GAMES_DESC: Games that develop hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills
CLINIC_DESIGN.MONTESSORI_TOYS_DESC: Safe toys made from wood and natural materials
CLINIC_DESIGN.SAFETY_PHYSICAL_DESC: Corner protectors, non-slip floors and safe furniture
CLINIC_DESIGN.SAFETY_MONITORING_DESC: Camera system and staff supervision in all areas
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_DESC: The highest hygiene standards are applied in our clinic. With our protocols updated after the COVID-19 pandemic, we provide a safe environment for both our staff and visitors.
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_TEXT: All toys and common areas are disinfected daily, and ventilation systems undergo regular maintenance.
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_1_DESC: All surfaces and toys are cleaned 3 times a day
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_3_DESC: Automatic doors and sensor-based hygiene stations
CLINIC_DESIGN.HYGIENE_NOTE: * Our clinic holds a Ministry of Health hygiene certificate.

KLINIK_TASARIMI.INTRO_TEXT: Our clinic features modern, child-friendly design with safety and comfort as priorities
